meanings.definition: To touch or handle with the fingers.
meanings.sent1: She gently befingers the delicate petals of the flower.
meanings.sent2: He befingers the keys of the piano with skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: The chef befingers the dough, creating a masterpiece of bread art.
meanings.sent4: The artist befingers the canvas, leaving behind a trail of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The child befingers the soft fur of the puppy, feeling its warmth and comfort.

meanings.definition: To mark or stain with the fingers.
meanings.sent1: The toddler accidentally befingers the white wall with colorful paint.
meanings.sent2: She befingers the paper with ink, leaving behind unique patterns.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat befingers the clean floor with muddy paw prints.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor befingers the clay, shaping it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The hiker befingers the map, tracing the route with a red marker.
